title: Project RX Episode 1: Design and Development
description: The Ford Focus RS RX was designed to be the ultimate rallycross vehicle.  Take a look at the process that Ford Performance engineers, M-Sport, and Hoonigan Racing Division drivers Ken Block and Andreas Bakkerud went through to get the vehicle optimized in both performance and design.
tags: Ford Focus RS RX, rallycross, motorsport, rally, Focus RS, Ken Block
